manifest.name: @azure/core-auth
manifest.description: Provides low-level interfaces and helper methods for authentication in Azure SDK

scripts.build:test: npm run clean && tshy && dev-tool run build-test
scripts.build: npm run clean && tshy && api-extractor run --local
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run build:test && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && tshy && npm run unit-test:node && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.test: npm run clean && tshy && npm run unit-test:node && dev-tool run bundle && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test
scripts.unit-test:browser: npm run build:test && dev-tool run test:vitest --no-test-proxy --browser
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
